Reviews.Title: AXESS TV
Reviews.Author: Floyd Mc
Reviews.Content: I installed this TV in my trailer, went to the auto parts store picked up a plug in adapter for the 12 volt.  Did all the basic 12 volt electrical turned in on and it works great. Good clear picture, sound, has lots of adjustments to fine tune the TV.  Bright and sunny has no drain on my solar set up.  AXESS my new TV people.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: daddy cool
Reviews.Content: This is a good LED tv.The price was very good. It's fine for a bedroom TV and that's all we needed.TV you can buy with confidence and will recommend to others. From Grandpa BearPS. It gave an extra touch to the RV. Happy camping

Reviews.Title: great for our needs
Reviews.Author: Brenda Wettengel
Reviews.Content: perfect size for our cabinet.  great picture.  i would recomend it.  might even buy another for the bedroom.  great value

Reviews.Title: Good deal TV
Reviews.Author: I. Carson "Farsi Friend"
Reviews.Content: rx'd in  a timely manner. Ideal for bed-ridden patients! great price.  easy to set up and operate. versatile with AC/DC and USB inputs

Reviews.Title: Missing one thing..
Reviews.Author: Carol Dopp
Reviews.Content: There are no remote codes that will let this brand of tv talk to the DISH remotes.  The only thing I do not like about the tv is having to either use two remotes, or walk to the tv to make adjustments.  Would have given 5-stars if there were codes for Axess.

Reviews.Title: Super Quality
Reviews.Author: Jon Lodestein "Jonnie"
Reviews.Content: Worked great , would buy it again, Using it in a different city every day, and it finds the local stations every time.

Reviews.Title: Very nice little TV
Reviews.Author: Steven D. Rayhill
Reviews.Content: Very nice little TV using in my small RV sound is great picture very sharp I would buy again. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my son!!
Reviews.Author: August Embry
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my son to run another monitor with his laptop and it works great.!! Its also has a 12volt adapter I can plug into the car. I get a bonus use out of the TV which I never thought about when purchasing. I fly FPV Quadcopters and I use the tv for video reception in the back of the car or my field ground station and it works awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Dennis L Dunbar
Reviews.Content: We enjoy our new TV in our camper. It is easy to set up and stow (kept the original box to stow). Good picture and picks up many channels.

Reviews.Title: Best picture,HD
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I was very skeptical of purchasing a TV over the internet and had never known of the AXESS brand. In addition, I was going to use an indoor antenna so the tuner was critical. I get all the air channels except those prefaced with 18 (Seventh-Day Adventist channels in Chattanooga, TN), but all of the other air channels come in great so I figure it has something to do with the antenna or possibly the Channel 18 TV station. At any rate, I am very pleased with it.
